original_text: He said to me, ‘You must go now, Daniel. This message will remain secret until it is time for the end of this world. The seals will keep the book closed.
korean_text: 그가 이르되 다니엘아 갈지어다 이 말은 마지막 때까지 간수하고 봉함할 것임이니라

sentences.original_text: until it is time for the end of this world
sentences.korean_translation: 이 세상의 끝 때가 될 때까지

sentences.original_text: The seals will keep the book closed
